document_data.name: Portal Barricade
document_data.mainbody: '''''Portal barricade''''' was a [[transmutation]] [[spell]] that barricaded a ''[[portal]]'' for the duration.
document_data.Effects: On casting ''portal barricade'', a ''portal'' stopped working for its duration that was counted in hours. Barring successfully ''[[dispel magic|dispelling]]'' it, no means, including ''[[knock]]'' spells or ''[[chimes of opening]]'', could return them to functionality.
document_data.Components: Casting ''portal barricade'' required [[somatic]] and [[verbal component]]s as well as a [[divine focus]].
document_data.History: At latest by [[1372 DR]], a [[magic]]al [[staff]] called a ''[[staff of portals]]'' was invented in the [[Underdark]] that required the ''portal barricade'' spell to craft and could be used to cast the spell too.
